trans-unit.source: The $TB_SETPARENT message does not change the parent window that was specified when the control was created.

target.mrk: The $TB_SETPARENT message does not change the parent window that was specified when the control was created.

trans-unit.source: $TB_SETPARENT. To change the control's parent window, call the _WinAPI_SetParent() function.
